productionSqlExpression: SELECT SUM(cumulative_balance) AS result FROM balances WHERE year_for_period = CAST(YEAR(DATEADD(month, -3, GETDATE())) AS decimal(9,0)) AND period = CAST(MONTH(DATEADD(month, -18, GETDATE())) AS decimal(9,0));
calculationType: Totalize receivables within the specified temporal bracket.

productionSqlExpression: SELECT SUM(cumulative_balance) AS result FROM balances WHERE year_for_period = CAST(YEAR(DATEADD(month, -0, GETDATE())) AS decimal(9,0)) AND period = CAST(MONTH(DATEADD(month, -1, GETDATE())) AS decimal(9,0));
calculationType: Totalize receivables within the specified temporal bracket.

productionSqlExpression: SELECT SUM(cumulative_balance) AS result FROM balances WHERE year_for_period = CAST(YEAR(DATEADD(month, 1, GETDATE())) AS decimal(9,0)) AND period = CAST(MONTH(DATEADD(month, -2, GETDATE())) AS decimal(9,0));
calculationType: Totalize receivables within the specified temporal bracket.

productionSqlExpression: SELECT SUM(cumulative_balance) AS result FROM balances WHERE year_for_period = CAST(YEAR(DATEADD(month, -2, GETDATE())) AS decimal(9,0)) AND period = CAST(MONTH(DATEADD(month, -3, GETDATE())) AS decimal(9,0));
calculationType: Totalize receivables within the specified temporal bracket.

productionSqlExpression: SELECT SUM(cumulative_balance) AS result FROM balances WHERE year_for_period = CAST(YEAR(DATEADD(month, -3, GETDATE())) AS decimal(9,0)) AND period = CAST(MONTH(DATEADD(month, -18, GETDATE())) AS decimal(9,0));
